div.p:
Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimoquinto die
mensis Maij Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo decimo

The said day Johnne of mar and patry leslie bailyeis assignit friday that nixt
cummis the xvij day of maij Instant to Johne arthour one that ane part and georg
tailyeour one that vthir to bring' thar previs hincinde that thai haue and wil
wse anent the clame of xxtj merkis clamit be the said Johnne arthour And' of
the condicioun' of the pament allegijt be the said georg eftir the tenour of the actis
maid obefor with consent of baitht the said partijs as day of peremptour

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorne' assis' Johnne of cullan'
forspekar that Wilyeame Wat in the stanehive sal bring Dauid baxter
in portlethin quhilk he allegiis skipper of his boit the tyme that Wilyeame
marris skynner alme come about in hir one petirevin nixt hereftir follouing
befor the prouost and bailyeis / quhilkis Dauid or Wilyeame Wat sall ansuer'
to the borght strekit one the said Wilyeame Wat be the said Wilyam mar anent
the said alme and ane of thame salbe responsal to the said Wilyeame for the said'
alme And' gif it happinnis that the said Wilyam Wat bringis nocht the said Dauid'
at the said tyme he sal ansuer' him self and be responsal for the said alme
to the said' Wilyeame And' gif he bringis the said Dauid betuix this and the
said' tyme how sone he bringis him he salbe ressauit And' patry lesly
bailye come Souerte be his hand' vphaldin for the said' Wilyam Wat that
he sal entir the said Dauid betuix this and the said' tyme or soner'
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio b eiusdem xvij die maij anno quo supra

The said' day Williame makesone myllar at the Justice myllis grantit him aving to
richerde redhede tua bollis of quhet for xx s' resauit fra him quhilkis the balyeis chargit
him to pay within terme of law

The said' day the prouest and balyeis chargit and ordanit Dauid murray to remoiwe and flyt
his gudis out of the hald landis of Schethocsley pertening to the saide burghe becaus
he has' nay tak nor' assedacioun' of the samyn

The saide day the Court wardit schew for law and It was gevn for dome that Jonhne
arthour hed preuit Sufficientlie that george talyour is aving to him auchtene merkis
vsuale money of Scotland' and awe to pay to him the said' Some for the quhilkis he
was in Amerciament of the court et cetera and that was gevin for dome be the moutht of William fynne
dempstar of the said court
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eisudem xxiiij die mensis maij anno quo supra

The said' day the prouest and bailyeis assignit monunday that next Cumis to Jonhne Smyth
to Comper befor thame for the pament of Dauid bannermannis hous' maile and relevin
of his pundis Ande ordanit to warne sere thomas bynne and the procuratouris of Jonhne
andirsone to comper the said' day for thar entires' tharintile

The said' day Canny barkar' was fundin feit seruand' with Robert pipar for iiij s'
and vj d' and was feit with Androw portar obefor' tharfor the balyeis ordanit the said' canny
to pay the said' iiijor s' and vj d' to the said' Robert Ande Canny alexandersone sale
pay iiij s' and vj d' to Jonhne ramsay becaus' scho feit hir' with him and obefor with
Sandy blinselez wif

The said' the Relict of vmquhile Androw barbar' oblist hir' fatht
fullie to pay tile Isabele schethin Spous' to Johne litstar x s'
ane Curche ane sark and ane par of Schoun' for ane yeris seruice
quhilkis quhilk megy Watsone suld' haue maid' to hir

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvijo die maij
anno quo Supra

add.foreign: commissarij electi pro assedacione terrarum de le frostar hil et cetera

div.p:
The said' day the balyeis Counsale an Communite warnit be the premunicioun of the common'
hand' bell throw the haile gathtrit and present for the tyme chesit constitut and ordanit
gilbert menyeis prouest sere Jonhne ruthirfurd knicht Johne Cullan James Colisone and
Jonhne of mar thar commissaris gevand' and grantand' and commitand to the said commissaris
and to the mast part of thame to set thar common landis of frostar hill and vthiris landis
being vnset to nichtbouris and fre mene of the tone Induellaris of the samyn for
the termes of yeris quhilkis deponit the gret aithe to Set the samyn of thar
conscience and knavlege for the common' profit of the tone Ande ordanit ane commission
to be maid' tharapon' and S Selit witht har commone Seile

Curia Balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vltimo die mensis
maij Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo decimo

The said day the bailyeis assignit this day viij dais to bessy lesly to
preif hir tak and assedacioun' gif scho ony has anent the hous pertening
to Johne of Ratre occupijt be hir And gif scho previs nocht his tak the said
day to devoid' the said' land'

Eodem die Johannes ruthirfurde miles Johannes Cullane Johannes Jacobus Colisone Duncanus
Colisone Dauid Andirsone Andreas fyf Dauid steuart Dauid murray Willelmus murray
matheus branche Willelmus rollande Johannes crag Johannes arthour Johannes moir' et
malcomus crag Jurati dicunt quod quondam Willelmus andirsone burgensis dicti burgi obiit
vltra vestitus et sasitus ut de de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri regis de
quadam terra anteriore Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico furcarum le buthtraw vocata inter
terram quondam Willelmi andirsone Jacobi ex boreali ex vna et terram Johannis murray ex australi
partibus ab altera et terram quondam Alexandri hay versus occidens Communionem viam regiam versus oriens
Et de vno annuo redditu quatuor solidorum de predicta terra ipsius olim Alexandri hay Et
quod Isabella andirsone filia sua inter ipsum et Isabellam Crafurde procreata est legittimam et
propinquior heres eiusdem quondam Willelmi patris sui de dictis terra et annuo redditu cum
pertinenciis et est legittime etatis et quod tenentur in capite de domino nostro rege per seruicium burgagium et cetera
Igitur datus fuit Johnani mar balliuorum vnj in mandatis et dictam ad
huismodi terram et annuum Redditum Cum suis pertinenciis secundum tenorem Carte sue et laudabiles consuertudines
burgorum

The saide day Jonhne piyle talyour was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' William rolland
forspekar for tribulance of Roger for the quhilkis he was in Amerciament and tile
amend' as law wile and forbeir' in tyme to Cum and the assis' referrit the amendis
tharof to the prouost and Consale and the balye chargit him to entir befor the Consale one
monunday that next cumis for the amendis to be maid' to the said' woman

The said' day Jonhne piyle talyour was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' Williame
Rolland forspekar for tribulance of the Court for the quhilkis he was in Amerciament of the
Court and tile amend' as law and forber' in tyme to Cum and that was gevin for dome

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiuisdem tercio die
mensis Junij Anno Domini et cetera quingentesimo decimo

The said day the bailyeis assignit this day xv dais to master Dauid louson'
to ansueir to the borgh' fundin one him be Johnne of meldrum for the wranguis'
withhaldin fra him of xxtj s' of siluer eftir the tenour of the oblagacioun' maid'
tharapone

The said day Johnne of mar bailye commandit Richerd litster to Remane within
the tolbutht quhil he content and pay to Wilyeame gray four elnis of blak
claitht

The said day Androw mortymer was conuict' be ane suorne assis' ser Johnne
ruthirfurd forspekar for the tribulance done to ormond' lesly officiar in the
execucioun' of his office one settirday the first day of June precedeand' this act'
for the quhilk he was in amerciament of the court sic as he aucht to tyne
of law and til amend' as law will and forber in tyme tocum and' that was
gevin for dome And' the said ormond' quyt of al tribulance don' to the said Androw
Androu mortymer conuict' be the said assis' for tribulance of the said ormond'
lesly one the sonday thareftir for the quhilkis he was in amerciament of the court et cetera

The said day Androw mortymer was conuict' be the said assis' for / tribulance
of nicholsone the wif of Dauid arrot in word

The said day androw mortymer was conuict' be the said assis' for tribulance
of done befor the assis' in the counsail hous'
Idem for tribulance of Dauid Arrot in the counsal hous' conuict'
Dauid arrot was conuict' be the said assis' for tribulance of Androw mortymer
in the counsailhous' in word' And' the amendis of the forsaides tribulance
continew to the prouost and' counsaile one friday that next cummys

The said day the bailyeis assignit friday that nixt cummys to Robert reid'
to ansuer to the bill of airschip gevin In be Wilyeam clerk apoun'
clamit be the said Wilyeame on' the behalf of his modir

The said day Comperit Wilyeame Wormet Befor the prouost
and bailyeis with ane maist part of the counsaile and communite gatherit for the
tyme humely menit and lamentablie exponit he was Informit that Alexander
hay his nychtbour had lamentablie complenit one him of gret tribulance
allegijt done be him \ to the said alexander Quhilk Wilyeame beand'
present of his avin propir motive and fre wil offerit him reddy till
vnderly the decisioun' of ane assis' of his nychtbouris na man to be suspect'
be him for ony tribulance allegeit done be him to the said alexander
quhilk alexander beand' warnit personaly be Johnne colisoune' bailyhe
to comper and follou the said Wilyeame of ony that he had to say to him
oftymes callit and nocht comperit to persew the said Wilyeame Quharfor
he solempnitlie protestit sen' he was thar reddy personalie present till vndirly
the law and determinacioun' of his nychtbouris in it that the said alexander had to say
to him suld' turne him to na preiudice in tyme tocum

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem septimo die
mensis Junij Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo decimo

Eodem die compertum fuit per legittimam Inquisicionem curie quod magister
Andreas Sanctlair est legittimus et propinquior heres quondam
Johannis sanctlar patris burgensis dictj burgj

The said day Dauid falconer of Ballandrou grantit to gif our the hous'
that he duellis pertening to Johnne Ratre in heritag til androw Kintor at his
hamcuming gif sa beis the said Androw wil duell and Remain in It

The said day the provest bailyeis and counsaile for honour and vphald
of goddis seruice Conducit and feit Ser Johnne trumbull sangster
to serue in thar queyr and kirk in all devin seruice in mess' matutinis evynsangis
and all vdir seruice belangin to ane sangstar for ane yeir to cum And
forthir gif it plesit the said ser Johnne to Remain or thai to ples' his
seruice ffor the quhilkis thai sall caus him be pait yerlie of tene
pundis sa lang as he Remanis in thar seruice quhill thai be of puyschance
to mend him his fee / quhilk ser Johnne sal entir at the fest of lammes
nixt hereftir to his seruice and licenc him betuix this and thane to red
him self of vdir placis quhar his geir was And this tene pundis
to be vptakin be the said ser Johnne yeirlie fra the personis and placis
that thai assigne to him

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimo die mensis
Junij Anno et cetera quingentesimo decimo

The said day thomas meldrum tuk him to preive this day xv dais
that the bedis clame be ser Johnne ruthirfurd knycht be the s tenour of ane borgh'
one him and his wif / was lad in wed to his wif of tua franche crovnis
quhilk day the s bailyeis assignit to the said thomas to preve his said'
allegeance

The said day ser Johnne ruthirfurd grantit him awand' to Wilyeame
makesone myllar xx s' quhilkis the bailyeis chargit him to pay within
terme of law

The said day Wilyeame makesone myllar grantit him awand' to Androw
meldrum ane boll of meil quhilkis the bailyeis chargit him to pay within
terme of law

The said day the prouost and bailyeis chargit alexander roche litster to
deliuer to Wilyeamne cowy tua stane of woll sauld' to him be the
said Wilyeame as was allegijt becaus it was fundin that the said woll
was nocht sufficient merchand' gud and dischargit the said alexander of the said
Wilyeammis clame anent the said wol

The said day Wilye Johnne of mar bailye commandit Wilyeame scrimgeour
officiar to war mathou branche patry reid' and Johnne craik to comper
one friday nixt tocum befor thame and preive thar pament of the woll clamit
be symon' elloun' or ellis to schaw ane sufficient acquittance of the pament
of the said woll

The said day Johnne of mar bailye assignit friday that nixt cummis
to robert reid' to ansuer peremptourlie to the bill of airschip gevin
In one him be Wilyeame clerk as air til his modir
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eisudem xiiij die mensis Junij anno quo Supra

The said' day the prouest and balyeis assignit monunday that next Cumis to Robert rede to preiwe
that he had' maid' contentacioun and pament of half the gudis and airschipe correspondent tharto
pertening to Williame Clerk sone and ayr tile vmquhile patry clerk and Elene Kintor his Spous'

Eodem die Willelmus clerk filius et heres quondam patricij clerk burgensis dicti burgi elegit fecit constituit
creauit et nominauit thomam Sraloche suum legittimum et Indubitatem procuratorem Curatum ac curatorem dans et
concedens eidem suam liberam ac omnimodam potestatem se terras suas et bona vbicumque locorum gubernandum
regendum et defendendum Cum eisdem Intromittendum Agendum defendendum Ceteraque omnia et singula faciendum
excercendum et substituendum que ad officium Curatum in consimili casu contstituti in vberiora forma curati
And' atour Dauid straloche become Souerte et Caucionar be his hande landis and gudis
to the prouest and balyeis that the landis and gudis of the said' Williame salbe furtht
cumand' to him and his profit and he to be responsale tharfor quhen he Cumis to perfit age

Eodem die Johannes ruthirfurde deuenit plegius legalis per manus sue dextere ostendem quod Duncanus
fif erit Indempnis pro eo aliter Dauid' steuart aliter quam per viam regiam Juris Et Idem Da
uid deuenit plegius legalis per manus sue dextere ostendem quod dictus Duncanus erit Indempnis
pro Roberto steuart aliter quam per viam Juris Et Cuthbertus Johnestone deuenit plegius legalis
per manus sue dextere ostendem quod prefati Dauid et Robertus erunt Indempnes pro dicto Duncano
aliter quam per viam Juris Et dicte partes obligantur fide' ad conseruandum plegios suos Indempnes de
huismodi fideiussione

The said' day Williame scrimgeour officiar' at commavnd' of the balyeis chargit Johne
Crak and mathou branche be his wand' of office to remane within the tolbuthe
quhile thai pait to Symon' ellon' thar part of the wole contenit in our Souerane lordis
lettres directit to thame tharapon'

The said' day Robert steuart was conuict' be an Suorne assis' Androw Cullane forspekar
for tribulance of Duncan of fyf in word and the said' Duncane was quyt of trubulance
of the said' Robert
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvij die Junij anno quo supra

The said day Dauid murray lauchfullie warnit Callit and nocht comperit tile ansuer
at the townis Instance was in Amerciament of the Court

The said' day Jonhne malisone and thom' Dougles was conuict' be ane Suorne assis'
Jonhne Cullane forspekar for the wranguis' takin of Sex girs' and ane Salmond'
of patry lesleis for the quhilkis Ilkan of thame was in Amerciament of the Court et cetera

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimoprimo
die mensis Junij Anno et cetera quingentesimo decimo

The said day Ormond' lesly officiar grant that he had deliuerit tua pecis
of clatht and blak and' ane grene to Duncan Wandy for certane money aucht
tile him as it was prisit eftir the tenour of the actis gane obefor quhilkis
claitht the said ormond' perofferit to Richerd' litster as he allegiit

The said day the bailyeis assignit this day xv dais to Dauid murray
to ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be Wilyeame bynne for the
wranguis' manuring and sving of ane fut braid' of ane croft of the
said' Wilyeame pertening to him in heretag be him self and his seruandis syme
murray and ane callit Richerd'

The said day Comperit ser Androw colisone and exponit how robert Waus
come daily and Inquirit his tennendis of sanct stephanis land' distrenyeand'
thame for ane annuell Rent awing to robert prat tharfor he offerit him
reddy to content and pay to the said robert Waus or ony vtheris schawand'
ane suffiient pouer the said annuell Requirand' the bailyeis that thai direct'
na officiaris to pund' his said land' vnto the tyme he be callit for his de
fence and schaw ane sufficient pouer that he has to ressaue the said annuell

The said day Dauid couper grantit him awand' to robert hill xj s'
quhilkis the bailyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law

The said day robert hill grantit that Johnne of hill his brodir sall Remain
with Dauid couper and mak him seruice as efferis vnto the hamcumin witht
of Wilyeane boll thomas craufurd' and' henry andirsone allegeit witnes
quhen' he was conducit with the said Dauid And the said Dauid protestit
that he mycht do to him as to his prentis' and' he bu fudnin his prentis'
and as a prentis' suld' be done do

The said day the bailyeis assignit tuysday that nixt cummis to Duncan
fif to ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be robert steuart for the
wranguis' Intrometting and awaytakin fra him of of iijxx appill
Renyeis with the mair out of Wilyeame Coistalis hous' of Deip

The said day Johnne of mar bailye commandit officiar'
to pas' and warne robert reid' to comper one friday that nixt cummys
and' preif that he had maid' contentacioun' and pament of the half
gudes and airschip corespondand' tharto pertening to Wilyeame clerk
sone and ayr to vmquhile patry clerk and elene clerk his modir eftir the
tenour of the act maid' obefor
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxv die mensis Junij anno quo supra

The said' day thomas meldrum falyeyas in his preiwe that he tuk to preiwe
the bedis follouit be sere Jonhne ruthirfurd' knicht laid' to his wif in wed' of
tua franche crovnis eftir the tenor of the actis obefor for the quhilkis the
said' thomas was in Amerciament of the Court and aw to deliuer the said' bedis to
the said' knicht and that was gevin for dome be the moutht of William
fynne dempstar of the saide Court

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxviij die
mensis Junij anno quo Supra

head.add: the graunt to Seile the chartir maid to findelaw pereson' vndir the common' Seile

div.p:
The said' day the prouost balyeis Counsale and communite present for the tyme
grantit and Consentit to Seile the chartir maid' be sere Dauid Waus
mastir of the hospitale with thar commone Seile of the land' of vmquhile
Alexander Wischeart to findelaw peresone et cetera in takin of thar consent et cetera
